text:
Hey, Nya, you might want to check this program
<https://wonderunit.com/storyboarder/>
It's free, I haven't tried it yet, but it looks interesting and friendly to use, and I did already come by more than one job ad related to animation/storyboard where the studio referred they used this program. So I suppose it's being used commercially as well.
If you like it I might try it too and see if I can assist you with something practical you might need!

attachments.title: Storyboarder - The best and easiest way to storyboard.
attachments.text: Storyboarder makes it easy to visualize a story as fast you can draw stick figures. Quickly draw to test if a story idea works. Create and show animatics to others. Express your story idea without mak
attachments.fallback: Wonder Unit: Storyboarder - The best and easiest way to storyboard.

text: The funny thing is I just downloaded this yesterday :joy:, after you mentioned storyboard programs. Still thanks for the recommendation, Iâ€™ll try it out today and report back to you, Marcelo.
